addListener

public void addListener(SMTPClientFutureListener listener)
Description copied from interface: SMTPClientFuture
Add the SMTPClientFutureListener which will notified one the delivery is complete. If the SMTPClientFuture was already completed it will notify the SMTPClientFutureListener directly
